then.line: ...What did you think?
It sucked.
Yeah that 5-0 butt grind was trash.
It was so bad I recorded it and put it on Tiktox.
Tiktox? Don't you mean--
No. This one is for videos so bad they could be considered toxic.
The caption is "Cool moves-- Not".
That's not very nice.
It has a hundred likes.
...Well it's not getting a hundred and one!
Two came in as you said that.
I'm just gonna show you another one. Hold on to your skulls, teens!
Ow ow ow!
Huh. What do you call that one?
I call that one the Wagging Tailslide.
Okay. Well...
That was actually good.
Yesss! Okay, well, will you tell me about Minty then?
We need to see one more. Then we'll decide.
And that's how it's done!
That was...awesome.
What? It's just your run-of-the-mill Corkscrew Phoenix Grind.
All us cool kids know about it.
I've never seen anything like it.
Yeah. Even Skater Gator couldn't have pulled it off. And he's like... a really good skater.
Hmm! Interesting! Almost like I...trained under Skater Gator.
Whoa, you did?
Nah, I've never heard of him 'til you said that. But from the sounds of it he's good at skating.
Show us one last trick. Let's see what you've really got.
